body_html:
@pjspillai Thank you for replying and spotting the error. Now I was able to compile Caffe2 without any errors. I have two doubts regarding this

  1. Is python setup.py build install an alternative to sudo make install mentioned in the Caffe2 website ?
    (PS : I just ran sudo python setup.py build install after cmake .. mentioned in the instructions. is that enough )

  2. I am using virtual enviornment and I checked which python i used to compile Caffe2 .

(detectron_env) rv@rv-HP-ZBook-15-G3:~$ which python
/home/rv/venvs/detectron_env/bin/python

Still I am not able to find caffe2 inside
/home/rv/venvs/detectron_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages

Can you please help me to figure out what I may have done wrong .

Thanks you for helping
rahul

Is python setup.py build install   an alternative to sudo make install mentioned in the Caffe2 website ?
(PS : I just ran sudo python setup.py build install after cmake ..  mentioned in the instructions. is that enough )


I am using virtual enviornment and I checked which python i used to compile Caffe2 .



(detectron_env) rv@rv-HP-ZBook-15-G3:~$ which python

Still I am not able to find caffe2 inside
/home/rv/venvs/detectron_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Can you please help me to figure out what I may have done wrong .
Thanks you for helping
rahul
body:
@pjspillai  Thank you for replying and spotting the error. Now I was able to compile Caffe2 without any errors. I have two doubts regarding this 

1) Is `python setup.py build install `  an alternative to `sudo make install` mentioned in the Caffe2 website ? 
(PS : I just ran `sudo python setup.py build install` after `cmake ..`  mentioned in the instructions. is that enough )

2) I am using virtual enviornment and I checked which python i used to compile Caffe2 . 

> (detectron_env) rv@rv-HP-ZBook-15-G3:~$ which python
> **/home/rv/venvs/detectron_env/bin/python**

Still I am not able to find caffe2 inside 
**/home/rv/venvs/detectron_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages** 

Can you please help me to figure out what I may have done wrong .

Thanks you for helping
rahul
